mapper.select: SELECT product_Id, product_Name, product_Price, product_Image,product_Type, product_Count, product_Comment FROM product where product_Type=#{productType}
SELECT product_Id, product_Name, product_Price, product_Image,product_Type, product_Count, product_Comment FROM product order by product_Id
SELECT product_Id, product_Name, product_Price, product_Image,product_Type, product_Count, product_Comment FROM product where product_Id=#{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_Name, product_Price, product_Image, product_Type, product_Count, product_Comment) VALUES (#{productName},#{productPrice},#{productImage},#{productType},#{productCount},#{productComment})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_Name=#{productName}, product_Price=#{productPrice}, product_Image=#{productImage}, product_Type=#{productType}, product_Count=#{productCount}, product_Comment=#{productComment} WHERE product_Id =#{productId}
